short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-skipping discovery queue on Steam store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually going through the Steam Discovery Queue? This extension automates the entire process, allowing you to skip all items in the Discovery Queue with a single click. Designed for Steam users, this extension will save your time and make the process effortless.

Features
- One-Click Skip: Automatically skips all items in the Steam Discovery Queue.
- User-Friendly Interface: Adds a simple and intuitive button to the queue page for easy access.
- Automatic Detection: Smartly detects the number of items left in your Discovery Queue and handles them accordingly.

How to use:
1. Install the extension.
2. Navigate to the Steam Discovery Queue page.
3. Click on the "Auto-Skip all queue" button that's added to the page.
4. Let the extension do the rest!

 The extension does not collect any personal data.
